original_text: He will knock down the high walls of Moab's city. He will completely destroy their strong place. It will all fall down into the dust on the ground. He will knock down the high walls of Moab's city.
korean_text: 네 성벽의 높은 요새를 헐어 땅에 내리시되 진토에 미치게 하시리라

sentences.original_text: He will knock down the high walls
He will completely destroy their strong place
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들의 견고한 곳을 완전히 파괴할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: into the dust on the ground
He will knock down the high walls of Moab's city
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모압 성의 높은 성벽을 무너뜨릴 것입니다
